completeListOfAbilities.name: Rising Wave
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
闇 melee BRV attack + 闇 magic BRV attack + HP attack
Self: 4 turns 1 level of Shadow Dragon (limit 3)
Becomes Rising Wave+ with 2 levels of Shadow Dragon
Becomes Rising Wave++ with 3 levels of Shadow Dragon
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Shadow Dragon active

passives.name: Rising Wave Extension
passives.desc:
When using Rising Wave、 Rising Wave+、 Rising Wave++:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost to attacks from Golbez、 Shadow Dragon
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Self: 8 turns MAX BRV Up II
passives.short_desc: Rising Wave Extension: Boost to Rising Wave

passives.name: Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises ATK、 SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Attack Speed: Raises ATK、 SPD

passives.name: Glare Hand Extension
passives.desc:
When using Glare Hand、 Glare Hand+、 Glare Hand++:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost to attacks from Golbez
 • Slight BRV damage boost to attacks from Shadow Dragon
 • Self: 8 turns ATK Up II

When using BRV Attack+:
Moderate BRV damage boost to attacks from Golbez、 Shadow Dragon
passives.short_desc: Glare Hand Extension: Boost to Glare Hand

passive.name: Dark Enchant Growth
passive.desc: Dark Enchant use +1\n\nDark Enchant effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Dark Enchant Growth: Boost to Dark Enchant

passive.name: Rising Breath of Darkness
passive.desc:
When using Rising Wave、 Rising Wave+、 Rising Wave++:
 • BRV damage boost to attacks from Golbez、 Shadow Dragon

When using Rising Wave、 Rising Wave+:
 • Shadow Dragon level +1
passive.short_desc: Rising Breath of Darkness: Boost to Rising Wave

passive.name: Sorcerer's Fingertips
passive.desc:
When using Glare Hand、 Glare Hand+、 Glare Hand++:
 • BRV damage boost to attacks from Golbez、 Shadow Dragon
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target

When using Glare Hand、 Glare Hand+:
 • Shadow Dragon level +1
passive.short_desc: Sorcerer's Fingertips: Boost to Glare Hand

passive.name: The Shadow Dragon's Master
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Twin Meteor
passive.short_desc: The Shadow Dragon's Master: May equip Twin Meteor

passives.name: Mighty Twin Meteor
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Twin Meteor
passives.short_desc: Mighty Twin Meteor: Increases BRV damage dealt with Twin Meteor

passives.name: Twin Meteor Advance
passives.desc: Moderately raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Twin Meteor
passives.short_desc: Twin Meteor Advance: Raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Twin Meteor

passives.name: Twin Meteor Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Twin Meteor
passives.short_desc: Twin Meteor Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Twin Meteor

passive.name: The Shadow Dragon's Master Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Twin Meteor
passive.short_desc: The Shadow Dragon's Master Extension: Boost to Twin Meteor

passives.name: Twin Meteor Force Ability Aspir+
passives.desc:
When using Twin Meteor:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost
 • Next turn after use does not consume ability use count

While equipping EX+ weapon Obsidian Scales (IV)+ or passive ability The Shadow Dragon's Master Extension:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit 闇 magic BRV attack + HP attack followed by 闇 melee BRV attack + HP attack from Shadow Dragon)
passives.short_desc: Twin Meteor Force Ability Aspir+: Boost to Twin Meteor; enables HP Attack+

passives.name: The Shadow Dragon's Master Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Obsidian Scales (IV)+ or passive ability The Shadow Dragon's Master Extension:\n • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: The Shadow Dragon's Master Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Twin Meteor Buff Plus Shadow Dragon Buff Starting Recast MAX
passives.desc:
When using Twin Meteor:
 • Self: 4 turns Atonement for Hatred

At start of quest:
 • Self: 6 turns 1 level of Shadow Dragon (limit 3)
 • Full recast gauge
passives.short_desc: Twin Meteor Buff Plus Shadow Dragon Buff Starting Recast MAX: Boost to Twin Meteor

passives.name: Twin Meteor BRV HP Hit Plus Force
passives.desc: When using Twin Meteor:\n • 5-hit group 闇 magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times becomes 5-hit group 闇 magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times\n • Tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
passives.short_desc: Twin Meteor BRV HP Hit Plus Force: Boost to Twin Meteor
